channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- FortiAuthenticator WEB UI
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- FortiAuthenticator WEB UI

item.title: CVE-2019-16154|2024-08-05T01:10:41.162Z -- fortinet -- fortiauthenticator%20web%20ui
item.description: An improper neutralization of input during web page generation in FortiAuthenticator WEB UI 6.0.0 may allow an unauthenticated user to perform a cross-site scripting attack (XSS) via a parameter of the logon page.
